title: Remove community and gallery sections from homepage

requirements.summary: Remove the community section from the HomePage component, including any navigation links, hero text, or call-to-action buttons that reference the community board
acceptanceCriteria: No community-related content appears on the homepage
Navigation does not include community links from the homepage hero section

file_operations.description: Remove all community-related content from the HomePage component. This includes removing any buttons, links, or text that reference the community board (/community route). Preserve the hero section structure and other homepage content such as the logo, main heading, and any other sections that are not community-related. Ensure the page renders correctly after the removal.

requirements.summary: Remove the gallery section from the HomePage component, including any navigation links, hero text, or call-to-action buttons that reference the gallery
acceptanceCriteria: No gallery-related content appears on the homepage
Navigation does not include gallery links from the homepage hero section

file_operations.description: Remove all gallery-related content from the HomePage component. This includes removing any buttons, links, or text that reference the gallery (/gallery route). Preserve the hero section structure and other homepage content such as the logo, main heading, and any other sections that are not gallery-related. Ensure the page renders correctly after the removal. Note: This operation should be combined with REQ-1's modifications in a single edit to the HomePage component.
